data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Nashik, Maharashtra, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nashik, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Nashik, Maharashtra, India will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Nashik, Maharashtra, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, bring yourself glory in Nashik. Through your servants plant 1,221 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Nashik access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Machhi Mitna people. Make the Machhi Mitna people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Nashik, Maharashtra, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the county of Nashik an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.section_summary:
the county of Nashik, Maharashtra, India has a population of 6,107,200.

We estimate Nashik has 67,179 people who might know Jesus, 74,100 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,965,920 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Nashik, Maharashtra, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
